# init(itemProviders:)

**Initializer**

Initializes and returns an activity items configuration with the specified item providers.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor init(itemProviders: [NSItemProvider])
```

## Creating an activity items configuration

- **init(objects:)**: Initializes and returns an activity items configuration with the specified objects.

items.description: Initializes and returns an activity items configuration with the specified objects.
items.name: init(objects:)
